title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from East Gippsland
creator_credit: Csilla Csongvay, David Withers and ACMI
brief_description: The towns of Swifts Creek, Omeo, Lakes Entrance, Orbost, Marlo and Cape Conran are quite distinct from each other but all make up the region of East Gippsland, which lies in the south-east of Victoria. In ‘ACMI in the regions: stories from East Gippsland’, locals from each town are interviewed about their lives, their community and what makes living in these towns so special.
